entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
